description:
This course:

  • will help women identify their skills to get to work
  • will help women to decide on what work they want, from which location they want
  • how they will want to execute work and at what time in a day they will work.
  • will educate women on process of finding work
  • will help women to help themselves to source work and earn
  • will help women to enhance the earnings of other women

The audience may include: -

Any women looking to get to back to work after their career break

Any skilled women wanting to start a career

Anyone, men & women, who can facilitate women on their goal to work from home
title: How Women Can Advance Their Careers from Home
